body_html:
Actually, text_classification.py can successfully be run, despite of all the warnings. However, I do want to know how to save models in that particular case. I searched Internet, but few were found. Below is what I'm using:

classifier = learn.DNNClassifier(hidden_units=[10,20,10], n_classes=2, model_dir="savedModel")

It's in the Line 106 in the script text_classification_with_model_saving.py, which raises an error when run.

body:
Actually, text_classification.py can successfully be run, despite of all the warnings. However, I do want to know how to save models in that particular case. I searched Internet, but few were found. Below is what I'm using:

`classifier = learn.DNNClassifier(hidden_units=[10,20,10], n_classes=2, model_dir="savedModel")`

It's in the Line 106 in the script `text_classification_with_model_saving.py`, which raises an error when run.
